text: Ian that is an option (per Domain) in your domain settings. you can assign a locale to a domain and determine if you want the slug to show or not. as you are migrating from a staging site, the host domain settings will be reflected on the staging domain. I HAVE seen some issues before where the support team needed to reset what was defined, if you do NOT have settings matching the experience, create a case Before you publish

Thanks Walter.  I think there’s something else going on with this one because the host domain settings aren’t matching the behaviour in content staging.

It may be that support needs to reset things, but I’m wondering if it might also be related to the fact that I’m trying to stage a multi-lingual page
Well, I ended up trying to switch between staging domains and all of a sudden was presented with a prompt to choose my domain default language and now the problem is no more.
